inclusion.criterion: Histologically confirmed diagnosis of in situ ductal carcinoma (pTis) or invasive breast carcinoma (pT1 and pT2)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Negative sentinel node dissection or axillary clearance (pN0)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Close (less than 1 mm) or positive (ink on tumor margin) surgical margin in a single breast quadrant
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Stages IIIB, IIIC and IV (any T4, any N3 or M1)
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Pathological metastasis in ≥2 axillary lymph nodes
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient is a 42 year-old postmenopausal woman who had a screening sonogram which revealed an abnormality in the right breast. She had no palpable masses on breast exam.
